title: Design company logo with AI-human collaboration
objective: Create a modern, memorable logo for a tech startup that reflects innovation and human-centered values. The design should work well in both digital and print formats.

inputs.description: Brand guidelines and color palette preferences

policies: Original work only - no stock imagery
Provide source files in editable format

criteria.description: Logo is recognizable and works at sizes from 16px to 2000px
Includes both icon-only and text versions
Works in monochrome and color versions
criteria.testMethod: Review black & white and full-color renditions

acceptance.reviewProcess: Initiator and human design expert will jointly review. Iteration allowed if needed.

evidence.specifications: Include process sketches or AI tool prompts if used. Document design rationale and any inspiration sources with proper attribution.

collaboration.sharedContext: This logo will be used across web, mobile app, and marketing materials. The company values transparency and human-AI collaboration, which could inspire design elements.
